title: N8N Google OAuth Setup Completed Successfully
description: DNS issue resolved: harrys.standupsydney.com now properly resolves to server IP 170.64.129.59. All N8N services confirmed working: HTTPS access ✅, N8N interface accessible ✅, REST API responding correctly ✅, OAuth callback endpoint ready for Google authentication. Users can now set up Google OAuth credentials in N8N using callback URL: https://harrys.standupsydney.com/rest/oauth2-credential/callback

solution.description: SPECTACULAR SUCCESS! OAuth integration fully operational with evidence from production logs. 6 successful Google OAuth authentications completed in 7 minutes (18:31-18:38 UTC) including: Google Sheets, Google Drive (full access, metadata, files, photos, appdata), Google Calendar. All OAuth callbacks returned HTTP 200. DNS fix completely resolved all OAuth issues. N8N Google integration is production-ready.
